items.title: Privacy UX Design Lead
items.description: Lead a team of 4 designers. Collaborate closely with PMs on devising experiments. Currently acting team lead for Privacy UX team

items.title: Senior UX Designer
items.description: Design ownership of the flagship product (Avast Secureline VPN). Collaborate closely with PMs on devising experiments. Currently acting team lead for Privacy UX team.

items.title: Senior UX Designer
items.description: Design developer documentation & developer onboarding experience. Research interviews with developers in the analytics/BI space. Interviewing and moderating user research sessions

items.title: UX Designer
items.description: Initiate & drive a design system adoption. Collaborate with executives to plan a UX strategy. Interview and moderate user research sessions

items.title: Technical Advisor
items.description: Devise knowledge management systems for a non-profit organization. Consult ICT procurement for a community center & incubation lab. Designed and developed the organization's homepage

items.title: Research Assistant
items.description: Collaborated on a project mapping the field of Information Management. Developed scripts for cleansing & manipulating large data sets. Worked closely with an associate professor

items.title: UX Designer & Web Consultant
items.description: Digital strategy consulting for businesses, startups & artists. Delivering tailored-made solutions with a penchant for UX. Devising system architectures & designing interfaces

items.title: Front-end Developer
items.description: Worked on a project basis with international clients. Designed UX concepts & developed UI prototypes. Lead FE developer on a project for a telecom network operator. Worked on a homepage redesign for a major national party. Maintained a homepage for a UK-based investment bank.

items.title: Assistant Project Manager
items.description: Overseen the development of a newsletter platform. Prepared pricing models, presentations, promotional materials.
